text: Niscaya'i musalima purusa o musalima nari ebam mumina purusa o mumina nari, ebam anugata purusa o anugata nari, ara satyanista purusa o satyanista nari, ara adhyabasayi purusa o adhyabasayi nari, ara binayi purusa o binayi nari ara danasila purusa o danasila nari, ara royadara purusa o royadara nari, ara nijedera abaruraksakari purusa o raksakari nari, ara allahâ€Œke bahulabhabe smaranakari purusa o smaranakari nari -- allah edera jan'ya byabastha karechena paritrana o eka birata pratidana.
